feature.label: PNML Framework Place/Transition Nets
feature.provider-name: Sorbonne UniversitÃ©s, Univ. Paris 06, CNRS UMR 7606 (LIP6)
feature.description: PNML Framework is a library to help Petri net tools handle Petri Net Markup Language models, compliant with the ISO/IEC 15909 Standard. It thus enables them to create, save, load and fetch PNML models. NB: This plugin requires Eclipse Modeling Framework (EMF). Therefore, you must also point the Eclipse update manager to EMF's update site. This feature brands the Place/Transition (PT) Net API.
